description: Use the reward code to get access token and collect token. When you call your access token to refresh token, you can go to authentication, get reward exchange page to check if token code is exchanged. Token code can be redeemed for chain tokens, and NFT support or on-chain permissions.

parameters.name: reward_code
parameters.description: The code to redeem an offer code reward code in on-chain protocol ERC721. This code can only be used one time once, expires in 15minutes

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: code
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if not zero

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if not zero

response_fields.name: received_id
response_fields.description: Return when reward code is redeemed

response_fields.name: refresh_token
response_fields.description: Use refresh_token to obtain new access_token. The refresh_token lasts forever unless revoked by administrators and the risk system

response_fields.name: access_token
response_fields.description: Access_token expire time is 24000 second from this api. Used for normal api

response_fields.name: expire_in
response_fields.description: Access_token expiration time unit is second
